actions.text: Amendment SA 2107 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 51. Record Vote Number: 181.

Amendment SA 2107 proposed by Senator Hickenlooper to Amendment SA 1717. To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to preventing the use of proceeds from public land sales to reduce the Federal deficit.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2107 proposed by Senator Hickenlooper to Amendment SA 1717.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 2107 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 51. Record Vote Number: 181.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2107 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 51. Record Vote Number: 181.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

purpose: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to preventing the use of proceeds from public land sales to reduce the Federal deficit.
